content.raw: You're right, it's not there yet. It will only show up once this pull request gets approved and merged. Also note that some of the things explained in the tutorial are currently planned to go into Gazebo 8, to be release in January 2017. To get the functionality before that, you'd have to build Gazebo from source after [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2360) pull request is approved and merged or install the nightly builds.
